text: Paul Raud (October 22, 1865 - November 22, 1930) was an Estonian painter. He had twin brother, Kristijan Raud, who was also painter. Paul Raud studied in Düsseldorfi art academy. ==Related pages== *Düsseldorf school of painting Category:Estonian people Category:Painters from Europe Category:Twin people Category:1865 births Category:1930 deaths
title: Paul Raud
